HOME.WELCOME: Welcome and thanks for checking in with {name}!
HOME.DESCRIPTION: In light of COVID-19 there is a mandatory Check-In System in place, to ensure maximum safety for everyone who comes on premise. This check-in system is required for both visitors and employees and you will be required to check-in on each visit to the premises.

LOCATION.REQUIREMENTS: To begin, please select your country and facility location
LOCATION.FACILITY_SELECTION_GUIDE: Select the facility you are entering:

OFFICE_GUIDELINES.REQUIREMENTS: Read and acknowledge {newLine} the Office Guidelines

PERSONAL_INFORMATION.INSTRUCTION: Please fill in your contact details:
PERSONAL_INFORMATION.INFO_CONFIRMATION: I confirm that the above information is accurate and I have read and understood the requirements and expectations of entering the Silicon Stack premises.

SUCCESS.DESCRIPTION: Thank you for completing. You can now safely enter the office. Please be sure to check-in on each office visit. Have a great day!

FAILURE.DESCRIPTION: Thank you for completing. You can now safely enter the office. Please be sure to check-in on each office visit. Have a great day!
FAILURE.INSTRUCTION: Please call your Silicon Stack Line Manager or Meeting Host immediately to advise.
